Heading: edX
Subtitle: Front End Web Development Bootcamp
First: Part-time bootcamp with 11 hours of weekly teaching as well as self-study, projects and assignments
Second: Topics including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, jQuery and frameworks such as React
Third: Additional training in object-oriented programming, test-driven development and storing data

Heading: University of Southampton
Subtitle: PhD Web Science
First: Thesis exploring social interaction in Virtual Citizen Science and its impact on volunteer behaviours
Second: Quantitatively analysed crowdsourced datasets with millions of classifications using Python and SQL
Third: Worked with external companies to facilitate take-up and integration of design recommendations

Heading: University of Southampton
Subtitle: MSc Web Science (1st Hons)
First: Computer science and computational social science modules including computational thinking, python programming, semantic web technologies, social networking technologies, web architecture
Second: Training in statistics, quantitative/qualitative data analysis and mixed-methods research
Third: Dissertation exploring content analysis of interactions in online amateur science communities

Heading: University of Southampton
Subtitle: BA Language Learning (2:1 Hons)
First: Portuguese and German language, socio- and theoretical linguistics
Second: ERASMUS year abroad at University of Porto, Portugal including study of German and linguistics
Third: Dissertation project on Portuguese as a lingua-franca in Africa
